titleStmt.title: The Count of Gabalis, or, The extravagant mysteries of the Cabalists exposed in five pleasant discourses on the secret sciences / done into English by P.A. Gent., with short animadversions.
Comte de Gabalis. English
titleStmt.author: Villars, abbé de (Nicolas-Pierre-Henri), 1635-1673.
Ayres, Philip, 1638-1712.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for B.M., Printer to the Cabalistical Society of the Sages, at the sign of the Rosy-Crucian,

notesStmt.note: Translation by Philip Ayres of the author's Le comte de Gabalis.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.

person.persName: the Cabalistical Society of the Sages
